# [Interview #36: Twitter 2011 (WoT), Entry #168](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=36#168)

#### [Austin Moore (16 October 2011)](http://twitter.com/Southpaw2014/status/125688685168566273)

Are there any scenes in
*A Memory of Light*
that you think will bring fans to tears? Other than it being last book.

#### [Brandon Sanderson (16 October 2011)](http://twitter.com/BrandSanderson/status/125755709756416001)

Yes.
